feed.title: Grimoire Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Grimoire: Release 0.3.1
entry.content:
What's Changed

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/compare/v0.3.0...v0.3.1 * feat: add logic to user profile form (342431c) * fix: invalidate state on settings update (560710b) * chore: remove unused log statement (ed8458f) * fix: don't display image container if there's no mainImage and screenshot available (65aede3) * chore: use proper default PB URL for dev environment (7289b62) * Merge pull request #74 from goniszewski/feat/add-pb-api-proxy (85523f2) * fix: use proper PB URL in prod/dev; resolve issue with server.js module imports (5d107a8) * chore: add 'prettier-plugin-tailwindcss' (581891c) * feat: add internal proxy support for PB API calls; add URLs enum; update 'ORIGIN' env handling (501a78b) * fix: invalid PB URL variable (bf99cd3) * fix: remove 'BACKEND_URL' variable, leave 'POCKETBASE_URL' with the default 'http://localhost:8090' (3f0b683) * chore: add selected screenshots to README.md (fcd1c97) * Merge pull request #73 from goniszewski/71-ollama-url-from-settings-is-not-respected (11362fc) * fix: resolve the issue with user LLM settings not being respected; clean-up (46d29ed)

entry.title: New release for Grimoire: Release 0.3.2
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Merge pull request #83 from goniszewski/77-top-level-category-does-not-show-all-bookmarks-under-subcategories-or-the-subcategories-of-those-subcategories (2066673)
  • feat: show related bookmarks on nested category view (8501cf4)
  • chore: add SerializeBookmarkList util, simplify util imports (8abbca9)
  • fix: wrong default used for PB while running app in DEV (dbf7daa)
  • Merge pull request #82 from goniszewski/76-subcategories-of-subcategories-do-not-show-in-left-column (050980c)
  • fix: add recursive component to handle nested category tree (85abb8c)
  • chore: add favicon variants (a2d79f6)

entry.title: New release for Grimoire: Release 0.3.3
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • Update README.md by @Geezus42 in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/88
  • feat: change proxy middleware to support WebSockets
  • fix: index file for 'lib/utils' causes errors
  • chore: update release-it config

New Contributors

  • @Geezus42 made their first contribution in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/88

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/compare/v0.3.2...v0.3.3

entry.title: New release for Grimoire: Release 0.3.4
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: search result's bookmark IDs are not properly added to the path query in (https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/commit/45c94d4a23c269c365b619915ebd74ce20ad98ae)

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/compare/v0.3.3...v0.3.4

entry.title: New release for Grimoire: Release 0.3.5
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix: search result's bookmark IDs are not properly added to the path query by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/93
  • chore: clean up apt index files in Dockerfile by @PeterDaveHello in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/84
  • fix: use 'slug' property instead of tag's 'name' to create the URL by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/98
  • chore: share 'pb_migrations' directory from Grimoire Docker image; add health check to Grimoire API by @goniszewski in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/66
  • fix: handle invalid image URLs for main_image and icon
  • fix: check if bookmark main image and favicon URL's point to allowed image extensions
  • fix: add missing 'wget' dependency, change CMD to ENTRYPOINT execution

New Contributors

  • @PeterDaveHello made their first contribution in https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/pull/84

Full Changelog: https://github.com/goniszewski/grimoire/compare/v0.3.4...v0.3.5
